CustomField.description: The user manually populates this field to indicate the debt secured by the collateral. This field links the collateral to the debt it secures.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicate the debt secured by the collateral.
CustomField.label: Debt Secured

value.fullName: Only this debt for the applicant
value.label: Only this debt for the applicant

value.fullName: This debt and all associated debts for the applicant with this organization
value.label: This debt and all associated debts for the applicant with this organization

value.fullName: This debt and any future debts for the applicant with this organization
value.label: This debt and any future debts for the applicant with this organization
